body_html: If I understand correctly, the checkpoint is being written to the same file repeatedly. Can this be avoided, i.e., each checkpoint be written with a different file prefix so that the checkpoint file isn't being rewritten while Tensorboard is reading it?
body_text: If I understand correctly, the checkpoint is being written to the same file repeatedly. Can this be avoided, i.e., each checkpoint be written with a different file prefix so that the checkpoint file isn't being rewritten while Tensorboard is reading it?
body: If I understand correctly, the checkpoint is being written to the same file repeatedly. Can this be avoided, i.e., each checkpoint be written with a different file prefix so that the checkpoint file isn't being rewritten while Tensorboard is reading it?
